definition: generation/period of 30 years/one's whole lifetime/lifelong/age/era/times/the whole world/the First (of numbered European kings)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
to consider oneself unexcelled in the world/to be insufferably arrogant
Man has but one life, grass but one spring (idiom). fig. the brevity of human existence
pinyin: ren2 sheng1 yi1 shi4 , cao3 mu4 yi1 chun1

definition: see 聰明一世，糊塗一時|聪明一世，糊涂一时[cong1 ming5 yi1 shi4 , hu2 tu5 yi1 shi2]
pinyin: cong1 ming5 yi1 shi4 , meng3 dong3 yi1 shi2

definition: even the wisest can have a momentary lapse in judgment (idiom)/every man has a fool in his sleeve
pinyin: cong1 ming5 yi1 shi4 , hu2 tu5 yi1 shi2

sentences.english: He appointed his son, Senwesret I, as co-ruler.
sentences.chinese: 他還任命兒子賽恩沃斯里特一世爲共同統治者。

sentences.english: Apple has an iPod customer for life.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果擁有iPod用戶的一生一世。

sentences.english: George I died in A. D. 1727.
Smerdis and his forces were defeated by the Persians under Darius I.
sentences.chinese: 士馬特斯和他的軍隊被大流士一世領導下的波斯打敗。

sentences.english: A moment on the lips, a lifetime on the hips.
sentences.chinese: 要知道“一時嘴貪，一世肥臀”。

sentences.english: I would rather be 'silly' for a few seconds than be 'ignorant' for years.
sentences.chinese: 我寧願糊塗一時也不要愚昧一世。

sentences.english: We were on the side of the angels, and we triumphed against overwhelming odds.
sentences.chinese: 我們和天使是一夥兒的，戰勝了不可一世的魑魅魍魎。

sentences.english: Hook finger hurts you for my whole life, put on wedding you is my bride.
sentences.chinese: 勾勾手指疼你一生一世，穿上婚紗你就是我的新娘。

sentences.english: So long as I he tranquil accompany me to pass this life time.
sentences.chinese: 我只要他平平靜靜的陪我度過這一世的時光。

sentences.english: That lifetime, rotating mountains, waters and stupas.
sentences.chinese: 那一世，轉山轉水轉佛塔。

sentences.english: You make me three fireworks, now only a blurred.
sentences.chinese: 你許我三世煙火，如今只剩一世迷離。

sentences.english: Recently, I met those guys I hoped for being my couple in my life again.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我重遇那些我曾渴求與他們一生一世的人。

sentences.english: "In honor of Charles I of England".
Darius I, when in power, Zoroastrian as the state religion.
sentences.chinese: 大流士一世當政時，瑣羅亞斯德教定爲國教。

sentences.english: She dress up in Elizabethan costume for the fancy?dress ball.
sentences.chinese: 她穿上伊麗莎白一世時代的服裝去參加化裝舞會。

sentences.english: With this time of life, for you to find all moved.
sentences.chinese: 用這一生一世的時間，爲你尋找所有的感動。

definition: a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
glory, splendor, wealth and rank (idiom); high position and great wealth
to stay together/to rely on one another
